item.description:
Based on his book, The World Peace Diet, Dr. Will Tuttle will explore the invisible connections between our meals and our psychological, social, spiritual, physical, and environmental wellness and offer powerful ways we can experience wellness and peace and contribute to a positive evolution of human consciousness.

Loving Hut's all vegan menu includes a Green Garden Salad with lettuce, cabbage, carrots, cucumber, bell pepper, mushrooms, fried onions (ask to leave off), and special dressing (raw oil and vinegar served on the side) and Fresh Orange Juice. The buffet includes a cabbage salad. http://lovinghut.us/worcester

A former Zen monk as well as a 30-year vegan, he is devoted to cultural healing and awakening. Traveling full-time with his spouse, Madeline, a Swiss visionary artist, in their solar-paneled rolling home, he presents over 150 lectures, retreats, worships and concerts annually. SeeÂ http://worldpeacediet.org for more details.

This event is also posted on The Worcester Vegan Meetup & Eatup http://www.meetup.com/vegan-365/events/68203662/ and Facebook https://www.facebook.com/events/281372901956651/.
item.how_to_find_us: Green Garden Salad and Fresh Orange Juice on all vegan menu and Cabbage Salad in buffet.
item.name: The World Peace Diet Dr. Will Tuttle
